title: Chicopee installs security cameras on school bus stop arms to enforce illegal passing laws
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Chicopee, partnering with BusPatrol, installs cameras on school buses to enforce illegal passing laws.
The cameras activate with bus stop arms extended, capturing evidence of vehicles that violate stopping rules.
The system, legalized by Gov. Healey in 2025, records violations without cost to the city or taxpayers.

title: Review and setlist: Chris Stapleton brings the blues to Mohegan Sun Arena
author: Chris Stevens
bullets: Chris Stapleton delivered a bluesy, soulful performance at Mohegan Sun Arena, captivating a sold-out crowd on February 28, 2026.
Stapleton performed with an eight-piece band including his wife, highlighting songs like 'Bad As I Used To Be' and 'Tennessee Whiskey.'
Legendary musicians like pedal steel player Paul Franklin and harmonica player Mickey Raphael accompanied Stapleton, enhancing his dynamic set.

title: 8 possible cut or trade candidates for Patriots ahead of NFL free agency
author: Colin McCarthy
bullets: Stefon Diggs could be cut to save the Patriots $16.8 million against the salary cap for 2026.
Christian Elliss might be released, which would save the team a few million due to his $2.25 million guaranteed salary.
Garrett Bradbury may be cut in training camp if Jared Wilson wins the starting center job, saving over $5 million.

title: Jayson Tatum won’t make return from Achilles tear in Celtics’ matchup vs. 76ers
author: Khari A. Thompson
bullets: Jayson Tatum will not return for the Celtics against the 76ers as he recovers from an Achilles tear.
Philadelphia's Joel Embiid will miss Sunday's game due to an oblique strain, expected to miss three games.
The Celtics have won eight of their last ten games and are second in the Eastern Conference standings.

title: Jarren Duran’s hot start to spring training continues, hitting 2 homers vs. Twins. What could it mean for Red Sox’ lineup?
author: Conor Roche
bullets: Jarren Duran hit two home runs against the Twins, bringing his spring training total to three homers.
Duran's performance is notable as he has historically struggled against left-handed pitching with a .232 career average.
Manager Alex Cora highlighted Duran's power improvements, suggesting potential for a key lineup spot despite trade rumors.

title: As 2025-26 Bruins exceed expectations, so has their prospect pool in college hockey
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: James Hagens and Dean Letourneau, Boston Bruins prospects, have scored a combined 39 goals this season at Boston College.
The Bruins have seven drafted players competing in college, including Hagens and Letourneau who excelled against Boston University.
Boston Bruins' prospect pool strengthens with key performances in college, promising a future pipeline of NHL-ready talent.

title: Celtics ‘clear pick’ to win the East? One NBA assistant coach reportedly feels that way
author: Conor Roche
bullets: A Western Conference assistant coach labeled the Celtics as 'clear favorites' to win the Eastern Conference despite trailing the Pistons.
The Celtics boast a 9.9 net rating and 29-11 record since Thanksgiving, leading the NBA in these metrics.
In scoring, Jaylen Brown, Payton Pritchard, and Derrick White each average over 17 points and 4.5 assists per game.

title: Review and setlist: Jason Isbell and the 400 Unit bring a well-rounded Americana showcase to Boston
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Jason Isbell and the 400 Unit performed at Boch Center Wang Theatre on February 27, showcasing a mix of Americana and rock.
The band featured new and older songs, including "It Gets Easier" and "Decoration Day," alongside covers like The Rolling Stones' "Can't You Hear Me Knocking."
Isbell highlighted themes of sobriety and personal reflections, while highlighting band members during a diverse and well-received setlist.

title: Latest reports suggest Patriots are unlikely to land big-name edge rusher before NFL Draft
author: Conor Roche
bullets: Patriots likely won't land top edge rushers Crosby, Hendrickson, Phillips, or Oweh before NFL Draft.
Raiders are not actively trading Maxx Crosby despite trade speculation and high price demands.
Patriots may target edge rusher Zion Young in the draft; Young impressed at combine with 52 pressures.

title: What Paramount’s pending purchase of Warner Bros. Discovery means for sports fans
author: Chad Finn
bullets: Paramount Skydance aims to acquire Warner Bros. Discovery for $110 billion, pending regulatory approval.
The merger may lead to partial integration of CBS and TNT/TBS, potentially expanding sports coverage.
Netflix, out of the bidding for Warner Bros. Discovery, may seek new NFL rights opportunities.
